overview:
As the co-founder, President, CEO and Chairman of Anametrix, Inc., Blaise has over 25 years of experience focused on building high-tech companies. He has an active role in Anametrix’ business development and strategizing the company’s product offering to the marketplace on a global scale.

A serial entrepreneur, Blaise previously founded several high-tech companies including WebSideStory, the Web analytics industry’s most prominent pioneer with the famous Hitbox and later the HBX product line. WebSideStory went public in 2004 and after merging with Omniture in 2007 was acquired by Adobe Software for $1.8B in 2009.

A forward-thinker in the areas of Internet Web analytics, Blaise has a strong passion for developing leading solutions that make organizations more effective in analyzing their businesses in real-time and quickly improving their bottom line.
